item.title: New Coriolis: The Great Dark Book, The Flowers of Algorab, Expands the Sci-Fi Universe
item.content:encoded:
Free League Publishing has announced its first expansion for its sci-fi TTRPG, Coriolis: The Great Dark. The first expansion is The Flowers of Algorab, a new prewritten campaign that tasks players with uncovering long-lost secrets in a new section of the sprawling spacefaring setting.

The Flowers of Algorab Pre-Order Announcement

According to an official press release, The Flowers of Algorab will expand the world of Coriolis: The Great Dark with new locations, stories, and tools for players and Game Masters.

This new campaign tasks Explorers with investigating the mysteries of Ship City and traveling along the Hammurabi Arm. This story begins with the death of an old ruin delver and the disappearance of a mysterious stone tablet. This kicks off a series of strange events within Ship City. What follows is the players navigating the various factions and internal politics of Ship City, and exploring ancient ruins on distant moons.

The summary of The Flowers of Algorab is in keeping with the appeal of Coriolis: The Great Dark. This new edition of Free League's spacefaring TTRPG shifts its focus away from spacefaring exploration in the vein of Traveller and more towards archeological digs into ancient ruins on alien worlds. The new book features rules dedicated to these expeditions, including rules for a mysterious, deadly plague called The Blight.

A copy of The Flowers of Algorab contains the following:

  • A Campaign book containing new locations, characters, and key plots
  • An Expedition booklet, containing player information about new Greatships and systems in the Hammurabi Arm
  • Full-Color maps of Ship City, the Charted Sphere, and the Lost Horizon
  • Delve maps and handouts
  • Blueprints of new vehicles, including Greatships Akhander and Rigel, the Grasshopper shuttle, and the Rhino rover

If you missed out on its offering during the 2024 Kickstarter campaign, The Flowers of Algorab expansion for Coriolis: The Great Dark is available for pre-order now on Free League's web store. If you pre-order a physical copy before the official release date of February 3, you will receive a PDF at no additional cost.
